original_text: You have done cruel things to the people in Lebanon. You destroyed their animals. The Lord will punish you for the things that you have done, and you will be very afraid. You have murdered people. You have destroyed the land and the towns and the people who live in them. You have done cruel things to the people in Lebanon. You destroyed their animals. The Lord will punish you for the things that you have done, and you will be very afraid. You have murdered people. You have destroyed the land and the towns and the people who live in them.
korean_text: 이는 네가 레바논에 강포를 행한 것과 짐승을 죽인 것 곧 사람의 피를 흘리며 땅과 성읍과 그 안의 모든 주민에게 강포를 행한 것이 네게로 돌아오리라

sentences.original_text: You have done cruel things to the people in Lebanon.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 레바논 사람들에게 잔인한 일을 했다.

sentences.original_text: The Lord will punish you for the things that you have done,
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 네가 한 일들로 너를 벌하실 것이며,

sentences.original_text: and you will be very afraid.
You have destroyed the land and the towns
and the people who live in them.
You have done cruel things to the people in Lebanon.

sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 네가 한 일들로 너를 벌하실 것이며,

sentences.original_text: and you will be very afraid.

and the people who live in them.
